rrhvella.coursework1

Class ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicPredecessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • rrhvella.coursework1.ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicPredecessor

  • public class ContextSensitiveNonDeterministicPredecessor
extends java.lang.Object
    A predecessor of a production in a context-sensitive stochastic L-system.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String context
      The entire context of the predecessor, including the letter.
      private int contextLength
      The length of the entire context.
      private java.lang.String precedingContext
      The context which precedes the predecessor's letter.
      private int probability
      Returns the probability that the production mapped to this predecessor will occur.
      private java.lang.String proceedingContext
      The context which follows the predecessor's letter.
